promptLine: lái vs qù — 来 vs 去
correctText: 来 = to come, 去 = to go

promptLine: dà vs xiǎo — 大 vs 小
duō vs shǎo — 多 vs 少
zuò vs zhàn — 坐 vs 站
correctText: 坐 = to sit, 站 = to stand

promptLine: zhī dào vs rèn shi — 知道 vs 认识
correctText: 知道 = know facts, 认识 = know people

promptLine: mǎi vs mài — 买 vs 卖
correctText: 买 = to buy, 卖 = to sell

promptLine: shàng wǔ vs xià wǔ — 上午 vs 下午
correctText: 上午 = morning, 下午 = afternoon
